results.title: Abridge Earns Rankings in KLAS Emerging Solutions Report
results.content: # Abridge Becomes First-Ever Generative AI Company to Earn Triple Top Five Ranking in KLAS Emerging Solutions Report Including No. 1 for Clinician Experience *Abridge ranked No. 1 in “Improve Clinician Experience,” No. 3 in “Improve Patient Experience,” and No. 4 in “Improve Outcomes” in the 2024 KLAS Emerging Solutions Report*‍ PITTSBURGH, PA and SAN FRANCISCO, CA—October 21, 2024—Today, Abridge became the first generative AI company to be ranked across three of four categories in the KLAS Emerging Solutions Top 20 Report, which highlights exceptional technology partners based on insights from 49 healthcare-technology thought leaders and executives across the country. Abridge ranked third for improving patient experience with a 41% increase in clinicians giving undivided attention while providing AI-generated Patient Visit Summaries that give patients a tailored visit summary written at an 8th grade reading level.
